name: Super Space-Stronaut (vocare4)
description:
This is my 2D Platformer, class project from Game Design and Development on Coursera.org. 

Currently trying to change a few things which is why the page isn't finished. 

Modifications:

  1.  Changed levels from tutorial along with having 3  total levels.
  2.  Added a boss for level 3. 
  3. Changed some sound effects and music in all 3 levels. 

Future modifications:

  1.  Killing enemy drops door key.
  2.  Adding dialog to tell a story.
  3. Add laser gun as a pick up.

Credits

Created by Ryan Petry

Assets supplied by Brian Winn, Michigan State University
